title: I've had 2 people within a week saying that they will kill my family.
body:
In this past week i've had 2 people threatening to kill my family in solo queue, that i my books is a permanent ban no questions asked. but of course Riot don't seem to care about their player base whatsoever neither of these people have been punished for it... this is an absolute joke Riot, these people THREATENED to kill my family over the course of 25+ mins and they don't get any punishment at all. I don't care if its their first offence that should NOT be allowed to happen without punishment.

Get you shit together and crack down on this bullshittery.

replies.body: I would like to say u must have done something which cannot be excepted in the game.

i mean my only reply for the games was :D because i dont deal with toxic people, i find it disgusting. the second one originally started flaming me because i got first blooded so i replied with :D and thats when it started, the first one yes i myself was replying but nothing anywhere near flame... was the same situation i died twice he started to flame so i replied "what do you want me to do? each death was a gank idiot" yes the idiot was overboard.
